txt.en: Soldiers are NPCs that will fight on your side and aid you during skirmishes. The Direct Soldier skill will order your soldier to focus on a specific target. Utilizing rankable deeds you can focus and direct your soldier's future abilities and appearance.

Soldiers are NPCs that will fight on your side and aid you during skirmishes. The Direct Soldier skill will order your soldier to focus on a specific target. Utilizing rankable deeds you can focus and direct your soldier's future abilities and appearance.
